from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from datetime import datetime

customer_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_customers_dataset")
geolocation_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_geolocation_dataset")
order_items_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_order_items_dataset")
order_payments_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_order_payments_dataset")
reviews_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_order_reviews_dataset")
orders_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_orders_dataset")
products_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_products_dataset")
sellers_dataset = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/olist_sellers_dataset")
category_name_translation = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_path}/product_category_name_translation")

display("Building dim_customers")

dim_customers = customer_dataset.select(
    F.col("customer_id"),
    F.col("customer_unique_id"),
    F.col("customer_zip_code_prefix"),
    F.col("customer_city"),
    F.col("customer_state")
).distinct()  

dim_customers = dim_customers.withColumn("dim_load_date", F.current_date())

customer_count = dim_customers.count()
display(f"dim_customers created: {customer_count:,} unique customers")

display("Sample dim_customers:")
display(dim_customers.limit(5))

display("Building dim_products")

dim_products = products_dataset.select(
    F.col("product_id"),
    F.col("product_category_name"),
    F.col("product_name_lenght"),  
    F.col("product_description_lenght"),
    F.col("product_photos_qty"),
    F.col("product_weight_g"),
    F.col("product_length_cm"),
    F.col("product_height_cm"),
    F.col("product_width_cm")
).distinct() 


dim_products = dim_products.withColumn("dim_load_date", F.current_date())


product_count = dim_products.count()
display(f"dim_products created: {product_count:,} unique products")

display("Sample dim_products:")
display(dim_products.limit(5))

display("Building dim_sellers")

dim_sellers = sellers_dataset.select(
    F.col("seller_id"),
    F.col("seller_zip_code_prefix"),
    F.col("seller_city"),
    F.col("seller_state")
).distinct()

dim_sellers = dim_sellers.withColumn("dim_load_date", F.current_date())

seller_count = dim_sellers.count()
display(f"dim_sellers created: {seller_count:,} unique sellers")

display("Sample dim_sellers:")
display(dim_sellers.limit(5))

display("Building dim_date (time intelligence)")

dim_date = orders_dataset.select(
    F.to_date(F.col("order_purchase_timestamp")).alias("full_date")
).distinct()

dim_date = dim_date.withColumn("date_id", F.date_format(F.col("full_date"), "yyyyMMdd").cast(IntegerType())) \
    .withColumn("year", F.year(F.col("full_date"))) \
    .withColumn("quarter", F.quarter(F.col("full_date"))) \
    .withColumn("month", F.month(F.col("full_date"))) \
    .withColumn("month_name", F.date_format(F.col("full_date"), "MMMM")) \
    .withColumn("day", F.dayofmonth(F.col("full_date"))) \
    .withColumn("day_of_week", F.dayofweek(F.col("full_date"))) \
    .withColumn("day_name", F.date_format(F.col("full_date"), "EEEE")) \
    .withColumn("is_weekend", F.when(F.dayofweek(F.col("full_date")).isin(1, 7), True).otherwise(False)) \
    .withColumn("dim_load_date", F.current_date())

dim_date = dim_date.select(
    "date_id", "full_date", "year", "quarter", "month", "month_name",
    "day", "day_of_week", "day_name", "is_weekend", "dim_load_date"
)

date_count = dim_date.count()
display(f"dim_date created: {date_count:,} unique dates")

display("Sample dim_date:")
display(dim_date.orderBy("date_id").limit(5).toPandas())

display("Building fact_sales (FACT TABLE)")
display("Joining: orders + order_items + payments")

fact_sales = order_items_dataset.select(
    F.col("order_id"),
    F.col("order_item_id"),
    F.col("product_id"),
    F.col("seller_id"),
    F.col("price"),
    F.col("freight_value")
)

fact_sales = fact_sales.join(
    orders_dataset.select("order_id", "customer_id", "order_purchase_timestamp"),
    on="order_id",
    how="inner"
)

payments_agg = order_payments_dataset.groupBy("order_id").agg(
    F.sum("payment_value").alias("payment_value")
)

fact_sales = fact_sales.join(
    payments_agg,
    on="order_id",
    how="left"
)

fact_sales = fact_sales.withColumn(
    "date_id",
    F.date_format(F.to_date(F.col("order_purchase_timestamp")), "yyyyMMdd").cast(IntegerType())
)

fact_sales = fact_sales.withColumn(
    "total_amount",
    F.coalesce(F.col("payment_value"), F.col("price") + F.col("freight_value"))
)

fact_sales = fact_sales.select(
    F.col("order_id"),
    F.col("order_item_id"),
    F.col("customer_id"),      
    F.col("product_id"),      
    F.col("seller_id"),        
    F.col("date_id"),          
    F.col("price"),            
    F.col("freight_value"),   
    F.col("payment_value"),   
    F.col("total_amount")     
).withColumn("fact_load_date", F.current_date())

fact_count = fact_sales.count()
display(f"fact_sales created: {fact_count:,} transactions")
display(f"Grain: One row = One order item (product in order)")

display("Sample fact_sales:")
display(fact_sales.limit(5).toPandas())

display("Metrics Summary:")
fact_sales.select(
    F.sum("total_amount").alias("total_revenue"),
    F.avg("total_amount").alias("avg_order_value"),
    F.count("order_id").alias("total_transactions")
).show()

display("Writing dim_customers")
dim_customers.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(f"{gold_path}/dim_customers")
display(f"DONE! Written: {dim_customers.count():,} customers")

display("Writing dim_products")
dim_products.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(f"{gold_path}/dim_products")
display(f"DONE! Written: {dim_products.count():,} products")

display("Writing dim_sellers")
dim_sellers.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(f"{gold_path}/dim_sellers")
display(f"DONE! Written: {dim_sellers.count():,} sellers")

display("Writing dim_date")
dim_date.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(f"{gold_path}/dim_date")
display(f"DONE! Written: {dim_date.count():,} dates")


display("Writing fact_sales (partitioned by year)")
fact_sales_with_year = fact_sales.withColumn("year", F.substring(F.col("date_id").cast("string"), 1, 4))
fact_sales_with_year.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").partitionBy("year").save(f"{gold_path}/fact_sales")
display(f"DONE! Written: {fact_sales.count():,} transactions")
